scene_description: An industrial workshop with active metal grinding producing sparks. A prominent yellow sign indicates '95 dB - HEARING PROTECTION REQUIRED'. A worker in an orange shirt walks through the area, appears to be on a phone, then removes it and gestures as if unable to hear, without visible hearing protection.
safety_response: Immediately ensure all workers in designated high-noise areas wear appropriate hearing protection as indicated by signage. Conduct a safety briefing on noise hazards and mandatory PPE. Supervisors must actively enforce PPE compliance.
